summary: The diff adds a React single-page marketing site composed of TopNav, Hero, About, Menu, Why Choose Us, Gallery, Testimonials, Contact, and Footer sections, driven by a centralized content config and styled with a warm Tailwind/OKLCH palette. Smooth-scrolling anchor navigation and image references are implemented. However, the presence of the required generated image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated is not evidenced in the provided diff summary, and there is unrequested footer attribution.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the Hero and Gallery sections (no backend image routing).
missing_requirements.reason: Hero/Gallery reference the expected /assets/generated/* paths via config, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (the diff notes some added files were omitted due to limits).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes explicit attribution/link to caffeine.ai and a "Built with" message.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
